description: Northstar Trail is part of 30 km Moonraker Trails System.  Single track rebuilt in '97, has many hills, a big gully, and bridge crossing wetlands. Connects to Cedar Snag and Bearclaw.
directions: Starts near Cedar Lake on the West Bench via access to Kicking Horse Mountain Resort.  After crossing Columbia River go 6 km on main road, turn left at signage for Cedar Lake, continue 2km, take right turn on Tallis Creek main, watch for sign on next sharp right bend in road.
title: Northstar Trail
